content: lion brand pattern # 60123a skill level intermediate lion® wool article #820 *discontinued* 316 yards *ed note if you are substituting another yarn it must be 100% feltable wool if you plan to felt the project * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge motif = 9½ in \ 24 3 cm diameter five motifs are joined as the work progresses finishing wash scarf by hand in hot water with a small amount of soap rinse in cold water repeat washing and rinsing process until scarf is lightly felted
